agents.description: Agents to deploy on all cluster agents. Comma (,) separated list of "filebeat", "metricbeat" or simply "all"

containerMetricsEnabled.description: Enabled pulling container metrics from DC/OS

globalFields.description: key:value list of global fields added to all events, separated by a semicolon (;). I.e. "environment:production; owner: Ben"

cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each Filebeat instance.

mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each Filebeat task.
